section_title: Registration of buildings forming part of other buildings.
section_text: 1 1 In subsection (1) of section 41 of the  Marriage Act 1949 the word “ separate ” is hereby repealed and for subsection (7) of that section there shall be substituted— 7 A building may be registered for the solemnization of marriages under this section whether it is a separate building or forms part of another building. 2 In consequence of subsection (1) above— a in the  Sharing of Church Buildings Act 1969, in section 6(4)(a) the words “other than paragraph 1 thereof” and paragraph 1 of Schedule 1 are hereby repealed; and b in paragraph 2 of that Schedule for the words “the said section 41” there shall be substituted the words  “                    section 41 of the Marriage Act 1949 (hereinafter referred to as “ the Act ”)”                   .
2 1 This Act may be cited as the Marriage (Registration of Buildings) Act 1990. 2 This Act shall come into force at the end of the period of two months beginning with the day on which it is passed.
